'''"Tequemecan Treasures"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tequemecan Treasures" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Ancestral Temple}}.
<gallery>
Item "Tequemecan Treasures" Location.png|Map location
Item "Tequemecan Treasures" Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h

}}
